title: Ziggs bug (Not sure where to post this as OCE has no bug report thread sorry).
body:
I just played a game of ARAM as Janna, and randomly about half way through game the enemy Ziggs abilities randomly went invisible.
I couldn't see any of his Q's or E's and his ultimate and W abilities didn't show the markers for where they landed making the game quite frustrating.

P.S Sorry if I posted this in the wrong area I wasn't sure where else to post because of bug report being removed. 

P.P.S Please bring the new player forum to OCE again, I personally know a lot of new players that would benefit from 
it and I personally enjoy being able to help.

replies.body: I get that with the blood moon kennen ultimate, its never visible, even whne its on my team.
